description: On the basis of selected works of O.E. Rolvaag, including Giants in the Earth, this course
considers the literature and history of Norwegian America in the later 19th and early 20th
centuries.  For the sake of comparison students also read selections from other Norwegian and
Norwegian-American authors.  Topics for consideration include ecology, family, gender,
agriculture, economics, technology, urbanization, religion, immigration, ethnicity, and American
